name: Deus Ex
notes: Launch Deus Ex to the Title screen after downloading from Steam and quit to proceed with the installation of GMDX.
content:
files:
- gmdx9:
    filename: GMDX_v9.0.3.exe
    referer: https://www.moddb.com/mods/gmdx/downloads
    url: https://www.moddb.com/downloads/mirror/124938/121/6cead27f75aebe402730f494baa4542e/
game:
  appid: 6910
  arch: win32
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
  steamless_binary: $GAMEDIR/System/GMDX.exe
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2015
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    arch: win32
    executable: gmdx9
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  run_without_steam: true
